data.title: Hunter College
data.text:
Fall 2024 registration begins for undergraduate non degree-seeking students. Visit the Registrar's website for instructions on how to register for, add, swap, and drop classes in Schedule Builder.

Challenge exams are for Masters Students ONLY. August 12, 2024 December 9, 2024 Time: 11am - 1pm, In-person To sign-up for a future challenge exam complete our ONLINE REQUEST FORM For additional information contact: nutrition@hunter.cuny.edu Note that only one exam can be taken on any exam date. Prior to exam date an email will be sent to students […]

Summer may be ending, but the reflections from it do not stop there. Come join us for a workshop to ease your transition from summer break to the start of school! This workshop will include a group activity where you can share these reflections with peers. Whether you volunteered, interned, traveled, or worked, come discuss […]

Do you have question about filing your Free Application for Federal Student Aid? Drop into the Office of Financial Aid on Tuesdays to get your FAFSA questions answered! Walk-ins welcome! No RSVP required.

Craft Your Key to Success in this Cover Letter Writing Workshop! Are you struggling with what to write in your cover letter? Join us as we equip you with useful tips for writing an effective cover letter! Online with the Hunter College Career Center.

The RN-to-BS Nursing program is for students who have an associate's degree in nursing and a NYS RN License and wish to obtain a bachelor of science degree with a major in nursing. Details of the program and the application process will be discussed. This event will be held on Zoom.

Interested in studying somewhere else in the world as part of your Hunter experience? Join us for a Study Abroad 101 webinar and learn how! The Office of Education Abroad supports international education opportunities for students of all majors who want to enrich their Hunter experience through international coursework, internships, and experiential learning opportunities. We […]

Drop-in to get the help you need with your FAFSA via Zoom. RSVP not required. Join virtual meeting at scheduled date/time. Zoom Information: Zoom Link Webinar ID: 861 0288 8128 Passcode: 201876
